tool_description: API providing global governmental data for nations and states around the world
name: Global Governmental Data
title: Global Governmental Data

api_list.name: CANDprimeministers
api_list.description: Get information for all Canadian Prime ministers throughout Canadian history. Includes Prime minister names, political parties and years in office.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://global-governmental-data.p.rapidapi.com/CANprimeministers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-governmental-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://global-governmental-data.p.rapidapi.com/CANprimeministers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-governmental-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: USPresidents
